cgcloud__Contract_Payment_Tactic__c.name: cgcloud__Contract_Payment_Tactic__c
cgcloud__Contract_Payment_Tactic__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between a contract payment and contract tactics. By using this object, you can check the contract tactics for which the payment is applicable after the customer has fulfilled the agreement.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Reference to the technical field. This attribute isn't shown in the user interface.

cgcloud__Actual_Costs__c.description: Describes the proportion of the payment request that's allotted to the tactic.

cgcloud__Contract_Tactic_Template__c.description: Describes the contract tactic template of the contract tactic.

cgcloud__Rejected_Amount__c.description: Describes the proportion of the payment request that's rejected for the tactic.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Indicates whether the table entry is either new, deleted, or modified. This attribute is used for the replication process.
